Frequently Asked Questions

How do I verify my student status?

You can verify your student status by registering with your institute details and uploading your student ID card. Our team will verify your information within 24-48 hours.

How long does verification take?

Verification typically takes 24-48 hours after you submit all required documents.

Can faculty members also get discounts?

Yes, faculty and staff members from verified educational institutions are also eligible for discounts.

How do I become a vendor on StudentDiscount?

You can register as a vendor through our vendor registration page. After submitting your business details, our team will review your application and get back to you.
